pkgmetadata.longdescription: p-Value Aggregation Methods // Contains functionality for performing the following methods of p-value aggregation: Fisher's method [Fisher, RA (1932, ISBN: 9780028447308)], the Lancaster method (weighted Fisher's method) [Lancaster, HO (1961, doi:10.1111/j.1467-842X.1961.tb00058.x)], and Sidak correction (minimum p-value method with correction) [Sidak, Z (1967, doi:10.1080/01621459.1967.10482935)].
